Params: {1: 'Forgotten Sand', 2: 'Chapter 4', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Kamui!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory24.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Kamui... Wake up! The floor's about to collapse!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Wait! Roland... Where is he? He just... I...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Roland already vanished before we broke through and found you... We just detected high Punishing Virus activity, what did he do to you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I don't know... but I faded out back then... I don't feel anything strange though.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The infrastructure begins to fall apart as swarms of Corrupted crawl through the seams.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Are you really okay? Though it is true that you currently show no signs of corruption.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'If your corruption threshold goes over, Liv can detect it before you can even tell it yourself.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory6.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Everyone, the last withdrawal route is also blocked by Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Corrupted will also evade the collapsed areas. This will only increase their density in our path.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "If there's no path, then we'll just have to break through and make a path!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Even if we do manage to break through, we still won't know where to go.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Where to go... Lucia, that reminds me! I might have a plan!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Just say it, we don't have time...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Strike Hawks are professional scouts, so to gather intel, we always plant monitoring devices on our mission paths.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'These devices collect high-precision geo-data of the surroundings. If they are still intact, then the mapping should be done by now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Calculating a route from high precision geo-data mapping... Liv, is that doable?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yes, if the data is precise enough, then with my computing power, it should be doable!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Alrighty, let's go retrieve the nearby devices then!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You just barely recovered from the fight with Roland, are you going to be okay?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "No problem, ma'am! Just a mere scratch! It's so unlike you though, Lucia, caring about others, haha!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I... I didn't care about others before...?", 4: '2'}
